### <i data-lucide='shopping-cart' class='post-icon'></i> **Consumer Sentiment Up, Inflation Down**

Consumer Sentiment rebounded to 52.9 in December, up 3.7% from November's 51, signaling modest improvement in household confidence. 
- **Consumer Sentiment**: December 52.9 (+3.7% MoM, +2.4% YoY from Oct)

{{chart:Consumer Sentiment}}

Meanwhile, CPI down 0.2% month-over-month, as inflation pressures continue to ease heading into year-end.
- **CPI**: November 324.122 (-0.2% MoM)
{{chart:CPI}}
